summary: 44 patients aged 2 to 18 years received trivalent split flu vaccine. hemagglutination inhibition (HI assay) was performed before and after vaccination. flu titers were determined by hemagglutination inhibition. ARI episodes were reported by the patients. of 33 samples, 20 (60%) were positive for at least one respiratory virus. 49 JIA flares were observed and 8 (16%) had a temporal relationship.
